snippet: Allowing corporate donors to pay for the day’s galas would send the wrong signal to a nation wary of Washington’s business as usual.
abstract: Editorial urges Pres Obama to ban corporate donations to pay for many expensive galas for his second inauguration, as he did for first.
lead_paragraph: Allowing corporate donors to pay for the day’s galas would send the wrong signal to a nation wary of Washington’s business as usual.

headline.seo: Footing the Bill for Inaugural Dancing
headline.main: Footing the Bill for Inaugural Dancing
headline.print_headline: Footing the Bill for Inaugural Dancing
